word_mean_info__list.difference: 指正式提出来供研究、采纳或实行的建议。
指在自己经历的基础上而提出的有益建议、意见或忠告。
普通用词，语气比advice婉转客气，也不如proposal正式。着重为改进工作、解决困难等提出的建议，有时含所提建议不一定正确，仅供参考的意味。
日常用词，泛指对某事物的想法和意见。
侧重指对重大的或引起公众关注的问题所持的看法和态度。
普通用词，侧重依据个人经验、学识和正确判断而提出的忠言。
着重指基于情感而非推理所得出的，已经固定了的看法，常用复数形式。
普通用词，通常指凭感觉和想象所形成的看法或意见。
普通用词，使用广泛。多指初步的或缺证据支持因而不十分肯定的意见或看法。
侧重指个人对较广泛或重大问题所持的看法，常用复数形式。

bilingual.source: Her concurring opinion slightly differed from the main opinion.
bilingual.target: 她的同意意见与主要意见略有不同。

bilingual.source: The minority opinion was eventually overruled by the majority.
bilingual.target: 少数意见最终被多数意见推翻。
你的意见对我们很重要。

bilingual.source: Mea opinion is that we should go.
bilingual.target: 我的意见是我们应该去。

bilingual.source: She dissented from the majority opinion during the meeting.
bilingual.target: 她在会议上对大多数人的意见持不同意见。

bilingual.source: His opinion is in opposition to mine.

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like your honest opinion on something. Of course.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望你能诚实地给我一些意见。没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my considered opinion there were no illegal dealings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我考虑后的意见是你们之间没有非法事务。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course you can look at it. Yeah, I want your opinion too. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当然可以看，我要你的意见。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I need a second opinion. Oh, John, calm down. When have you ever managed two opinions? You'd fall over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我要听听别人的意见。约翰，冷静点。你怎么受得了两种意见？你会崩溃的。

yingyinNormal.en: I think he should go. Fine. A third opinion. Monkey? Viper? Tigress?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得他应该去。好，再来个意见，金猴？灵蛇？娇虎？

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe, will you wait here? I wanna get your opinion on something. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，能在这里等一下吗？我想听听你的意见。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: His current murder trial. I told him that the parents of his client came to me for a second opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他手上的谋杀案，我告诉他，他客户的父母来找我，让我提供不同意见。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't take Po away from me. No, no I want a second opinion. Shifu, open another scroll or something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能把我们家阿宝带走，不不，我要别的意见，师傅，再开一卷吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you just do what I think you did? I'm simply stating my opinion about the taxation of web commerce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你刚才说的意思是不是和我想的一样? 我只是说了我对网络商务税收的意见。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I've always said, if I was black, I would have gotten a d-1 scholarship, But that's my personal opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，我常说如果我是黑人，我会得到第一分区学校的奖学金，但那只是我的个人意见

yingyinNormal.en: We should have a longer conversation about that, Frank. I really value your opinion. Thank you for coming. Hope?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个问题我们回头再详细谈，弗兰克，我真的很重视你的意见，谢谢各位的到来，霍普？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I believe we can change her opinion of me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为我们可以改变她对我的看法。

yingyinNormal.en: Most of the world doesn't share your opinion, Mr. Wayne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大部分人并不同意你的观点，韦恩先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Sounds a lot like you. Good. Thank you for your opinion, Chuck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听起来就是你的翻版。很好，感谢你的观点，飞镖。

yingyinNormal.en: The hope has been that you'd eventually bend to public opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的本意其实是你最终能变得正常一点。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what did she do that was so crazy, Luke, give you her opinion?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她做了什么神经病的事？卢克跟你说了她的建议吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Francis, I know you value my opinion. Absolutely, above all others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰西斯，我知道你看重我的想法。当然，超过一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Claire, I value your opinion. I just don't agree with it this time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克莱尔，我看重你的想法，但我这次不认同你。

yingyinNormal.en: I can only assume you have an opinion as to which road must be taken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样的话，我只能认为你已经想好了我该怎么做。

yingyinNormal.en: It's always nice to have a man's opinion. You were right, by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能听到男人的想法总是好事。顺便说下，你是对的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a belief based on experience and on certain facts but not amounting to sure knowledge

examination_example.sentence: Be open to hearing other <highlight>opinions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 愿意听取其他意见。

examination_example.sentence: "Their <highlight>opinions</highlight> can change tomorrow," Gurner said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们的看法明天可能会改变，”Gurner说。

examination_example.sentence: And placing too much emphasis on their <highlight>opinions</highlight> can ruin a fantastic home purchase.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过分强调他们的意见会毁了一个很棒的购房计划。

examination_example.sentence: College students' ratings of college courses aligned better with experts' <highlight>opinions</highlight> when the students weren't asked to analyze their rationale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当不要求学生分析他们的理由时，大学生对大学课程的评价更符合专家的意见。

examination_example.sentence: "Each year the physical presence rule becomes further removed from economic reality," he wrote in an <highlight>opinion</highlight> joined by four other justices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在一份由其他四名法官加入的意见中写道：“实体存在规则每年都会进一步脱离经济现实。”

examination_example.sentence: The Supreme Court's <highlight>opinion</highlight> overruled a pair of decades-old decisions that states said cost them billions of dollars in lost revenue annually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院的意见推翻了两项已有数十年历史的判决，各州称这些判决每年给它们造成数十亿美元的收入损失。

examination_example.sentence: James Herriot, contrary to popular <highlight>opinion</highlight>, did not find it easy in his early days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与大众的看法相反，James Herriot在早期并不觉得写作容易。

examination_example.sentence: Invite public <highlight>opinion</highlight> on the plastics crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邀请公众对塑料危机发表意见。

examination_example.sentence: When public <highlight>opinion</highlight> is particularly polarised monarchs can rise above "mere" politics and "embody" a spirit of national unity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当公众舆论特别两极化时，君主们可以超越“单纯的”政治，“体现”一种民族团结的精神。

examination_example.sentence: Had a low <highlight>opinion</highlight> of GDP.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对国内生产总值评价不高。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a belief based on experience and on certain facts but not amounting to sure knowledge

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>opinion</highlight> of some of the world's best scientific minds, we don't yet have any answer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一些世界上最好的科学家看来，我们还没有任何答案。

examination_example.sentence: What are UK people's <highlight>opinions</highlight> about the levy of tourist tax?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国人对征收旅游税有什么看法？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a belief based on experience and on certain facts but not amounting to sure knowledge

examination_example.sentence: Later, political strategists adopted the terms to influence public <highlight>opinion</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，政治战略家采用这些术语来影响舆论。

examination_example.sentence: To sway public <highlight>opinion</highlight> of the impact of human activities on Earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动摇公众对人类活动对地球影响的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Scholars and policymakers have different <highlight>opinions</highlight> about it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学者和政策制定者对此有不同的看法。

word_usage.usage: 在“of the opinion that（持…看法；认为；相信）”“of the same opinion（意见一致）”等短语中，opinion不能用复数。如：He is of the opinion that money is not important. 他认为钱并不重要。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In Mohan's <highlight>opinion</highlight>, what human quality is lacking in digital beings?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在莫汉看来，数字人缺少什么样的人的素质？

examination_example.sentence: In my <highlight>opinion</highlight>, students can benefit a lot from doing some housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，学生可以从做家务中受益匪浅。

examination_example.sentence: The best of a Kilimanjaro experience, in my <highlight>opinion</highlight>, isn't reaching the top.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，登顶不是爬乞力马扎罗山最好的体验。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 意见; 看法; 想法

examination_example.sentence: What’s Dr. Alice Green’s <highlight>opinion</highlight> about afterschool activities?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾丽斯·格林博士对课外活动有什么看法？

examination_example.sentence: Everyone has his or her own <highlight>opinion</highlight> (观点) of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都有自己的看法的世界。

examination_example.sentence: Another runner mentioned the guidance provided by the organizers when asked for his <highlight>opinion</highlight> on the marathon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当被问及对马拉松的看法时，另一名跑步者提到了组织者提供的指导。
